properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 11:27AM EST until January 5 at 4:25AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

South Chickamauga Creek Near Chickamauga TN affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The South Chickamauga Creek Near Chickamauga TN.
* From this evening until late Saturday night.
* At 11:15 AM Friday the stage was 15.8 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to
rise to near 19.0 feet by tomorrow morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by tomorrow late evening.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to
rise to near 19.0 feet by tomorrow morning. The river will fall
back below flood stage by tomorrow late evening.
* At 19.0 feet...Water across Mack Smith road begins to impede
traffic. West Chickamauga Creek overflows its banks near the
Georgia state line and inundates several roads and properties in
the area.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
